Notice of the activity

june 12nd,
this notice is for the purpose of recruiting new members for the Studentsâ€™ union.(on behalf of studentsâ€™ union),and there are certain qualication for application.
to begin with, it is advisable for application to possess certain experience and ability to organize activities, which is of great importance for being members off the studentsâ€™ Union ,in addition, ideal applicants are supposed to communicate with others efficently.Lastly, we hope you can always try your utmost to accomplish your work. then what can you get if you joiin the studentsâ€™ union. this job will bring you opportunities to make new friends.arouse you passion for campus activities and of course, help you to cultivate your leadership.Meanwhile, we are convinced that your working experience here will be rewarding for your future job hunting, accoringly, if you dream to enhance your comprehensive quality,come on and join us.
an interview wil be he held at 18:00 in the center of studentsâ€™ union. activities and anyone is welcome to participate in the interview.
sincerely yours
studentsâ€™ union

æ•°æ®ç»“æ„

ç®—æ³•æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä»¥ç®—æ³•ä¸­åŸºæœ¬æ“ä½œé‡å¤æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼ˆç®€ç§° é¢‘åº¦ï¼‰ä½œä¸ºç®—æ³•çš„æ—¶é—´åº¦é‡ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æ‰“å­—è®¡ç®—å‡ºç›¸åº”çš„æ•°é‡çº§å³å¯

å¦‚ï¼š

O(1) < O(log2 (n)) < O(n) < O(nlog2 (n)) < O(n^2) < O(n^3) < O(2^n) < O(n!) <O(n^n)

å¤§oè¡¨è¾¾å¼ T(n) = O(è¡¨è¾¾å¼) n â€”> è¡¨ç¤ºé—®é¢˜è§„æ¨¡

  1. åŠ æ³•è§„åˆ™ï¼šå¤šé¡¹ç›¸åŠ ï¼Œä¿ç•™æœ€é«˜é˜¶é¡¹ï¼Œå¹¶å°†ç³»æ•°åŒ–ä¸º1
    1. T(n) = n^3+n^2 +nlog2(n) + n log2(n) = n^3
  2. ä¹˜æ³•è§„åˆ™ï¼šå¤šé¡¹ç›¸ä¹˜éƒ½ä¿ç•™ï¼Œå¹¶å°†ç³»æ•°åŒ–ä¸º1
    1. T(n)=n*n^2 = n^3
    2. T(n) = 2n^3*3n^4 = n^7
  3. åŠ æ³•ä¹˜æ³•æ··åˆè§„åˆ™ï¼šå°æ‹¬å·å†ä¹˜æ³•è§„åˆ™è€Œï¼Œæœ€ååŠ æ³•è§„åˆ™
    1. T(n)=n^2*n^3+n^3 = n^5 + n^3 = n^5
    2. T(n)=(2n+3)(2n^4+4) = 2(n)\2(n^4)=n^5

  1. T(n) = o(1)

  2. 1 2 4 8 16 32â€¦.n

    â€‹ 2^x = n

    â€‹ x = log2(n) â€”-> T(n) =o( log2(n))

  3. T(n)= 1+1+n+1+n+n = O(n)

  4. T(n)=o(n)*o(log2(n)) = o(nlog2(n))

  5. T(n)=o(n)*o(n)=o(n^2)

  6. T(n)=o(n)*o(n)*o(n)=o(n^3)

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
